NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 PYE: Poke! Thank goodness you're here, my friend. We're positively lost - is this not the method of entry into the Deep Storm Station? 2 1 POKE: Goodness, no! We need to head to the new warp pad constructed at Cassava's Construction Yard as fast as we can, before the Deep Storm Station's test begins! 3 1 POKE: Did the two of you not receive directions from Cassava on how to reach the Deep Storm Station? Even I received an invitation from him... Through Daz! 4 2 IDAEA: It's hopeless.. Giant's Deep will take forever to orbit overhead this warp transmitter again, and traveling there by shuttle will take even longer! 5 3 PYE: Wait! I remember now.. Cassava gave me a voyager stone to the Deep Storm Station several weeks ago, so we could observe the test remotely without needing to travel there! Oh, but where did I leave it... 6 5 IDAEA: Pye!! How could you forget such an important detail? Argh, it must be somewhere in that clutter you always leave on the Sun Station's catwalk! 7 6 POKE: There's no time to waste! Come, my friends - let us return to the Sun Station at once and find that voyager stone before the test begins! Tower EX3 4 SS R1 4 SS R2 8 DSS R5 1
